double-array:
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))
triple-array:
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))
c = list(map(int, input().split()))
string-array:
n = int(input())
s = []
for i in range(n):
  s.append(input())
array-vertical:
n = int(input())
a = []
for i in range(n):
  a.append(int(input()))
double-arra-vertical:
n = int(input())
a = []
b = []
for i in range(n):
  args = list(map(int, input().split()))
  a.append(args[0])
  b.append(args[1])
triple-array-vertical:
n = int(input())
a = []
b = []
c = []
for i in range(n):
  args = list(map(int, input().split()))
  a.append(args[0])
  b.append(args[1])
  c.append(args[2])
2d-array:
n = int(input())
a = []
for i in range(n):
  a.append(list(map(int, input().split())))
